title: Behold Your Snow Dogs* 2024 Vol. TWO
text: If you missed the magnficient Volume One, you can see them [here](https://www.popville.com/2024/01/first-snow-dogs-of-2024-vol-one/). â€œThis is Josie in Petworth cominâ€™ in hot during some snow fetchâ€ Many, many more snow dogs after the jump. â€œThis is Rolly. Heâ€™s only been in DC (Barnaby Woods) for 48 hours (and on the planet for 8 weeks!) but he thinks weâ€™ve got the best weather anywhere!â€ â€œNoosa and shadow Park Viewâ€ â€œManzi with frozen whiskers in Fort Reno, Tenleytown. Coming from Mozambique â€“ this is his first proper snow!â€ â€œForest playing in the snow at Meridian Hill/Malcom X parkâ€ â€œSkully at Pierce Mill!â€ â€œTracer enjoying the weather!â€ â€œThis is Banana from Petworth! (@banana_in_a_bandana on IG)â€ â€œZadie at Difficult Runâ€ â€œAngusâ€™s first snow!â€ â€œTilly enjoying the snow at Volta Park in Georgetownâ€ â€œThis is Bentley from SW Wharf! @helloitsbentley_â€ â€œGeorge in Shaw is not a fan of the snow today haha!â€ â€œWeller the Boykin Enjoying Rock Creek Parkâ€ â€œFergie in Petworthâ€ â€œFrankie, Georgetownâ€ â€œCoco from Pentagon Cityâ€ â€œSpritz from Kingman Parkâ€ â€œLila, Just poking around NoMaâ€ â€œTazzie in Capitol Hillâ€ â€œRomeo, National Cathedralâ€ â€œViolet the Spring Rd snow-dogâ€ â€œNelly in Takoma Parkâ€ â€œFinn, of Bloomingdale!â€ â€œFinnâ€™s sister, Phoebe (not of bloomingdale)â€ *You can send your snow dogs (cats, rabbits, who knows) to [[email protected]](/cdn-cgi/l/email-protection) and let me know your petâ€™s name and what neighborhood you are in. Thanks! There is a very long queue but I promise all will, eventually, be posted. Recent Stories Thanks to Rory, Sharon, and Mahogany for sending from Petworth. Friends of the White Whale Society is brought to you by the team behind Hawks*** around Town. You can emailâ€¦ â€œDear PoPville, Frankie in Georgetown looks very much like our Winnie the Poodle in Hill East. Weâ€™d really love to bring these two together, If you have any animal/pet photos youâ€™d like to share please send an email to princeofpetworth(at)gmail(dot)com with â€˜Animal Fixâ€™ in the title and say the name of your pet andâ€¦ 14th and Irving St, NW Thanks to guacamolly for sharing: â€œnot sure if anyoneâ€™s mentioned this yet â€“ I got verbal confirmation from a pharmacist that the Columbia Heights CVSâ€¦ An electrifying evening of drag extravagance featuring sensational performances from Rupaulâ€™s Drag Race All Stars 6 Winner Kylie Sonique Love, Vanessa Vanjie Matteo, Mistress Isabelle Brooks and Luxx Noir London! Your beloved D.C. queens- Cake Pop!, Crystal Edge, Dreux Sidora and Crimsyn- open the show. Afterwards, LET LOOSE and dance the night away to infectious disco house beats spun by NYCâ€™s DJ Boyyyish until closing. Purple looks are encouraged! Start the year off right by helping support a wonderful not-for-profit organization in the Nationâ€™s Capital for our first fundraiser of 2024! Join us for a festive celebration, dedicated to some of the finest melodies of the operatic cannon and the holiday season. Maestro Julien Benichou will bring his infectious energy as he leads the WOS Chamber Ensemble in an evening you will be sure to remember. We cordially invite you to Carderock Falls Manor to enjoy an intimate holiday celebration in Woof Trap Theater, where an inedible experience of musical enchantment awaits you. This evening will feature the following outstanding WOS opera stars: Juliette Di Bello, Jason Karn, Manuela Tomaz Korossy, and Kristin Sampson; with narration provided by Robin Phillips. Lisa is back with another season of Vanderpump Rules, and weâ€™re ready to celebrate in a big way with a viewing party for season 11!
